issue.title: model issues - corrupted view with debian 4.2.4-1~trusty and 3.0.2 library

content.raw:
Running default instructions from the web for library 3.0.2.

I updated another machine and did not see this problem.  Therefore it is likely a graphics driver issue.  Old drcsim ran fine on the machine that had this issue, but I'll try re-installing the NVIDIA drivers and try again.
content.html:
Running default instructions from the web for library 3.0.2.

I updated another machine and did not see this problem. Therefore it is likely a graphics driver issue. Old drcsim ran fine on the machine that had this issue, but I'll try re-installing the NVIDIA drivers and try again.
